https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zjUFr6MHaRL9hpaJR7FMp7CwDnc.jpg Gemma, a big city architect, must fly to the Hawaii in order to handle the estate of her late Aunt. At her Aunt's request, she must first renovate the house. Ben, a handsome country-boy contractor helps her revive the home and in the process revitalizes Gemma. Aloha with Love
